title: 無乜用，但都寫左封complaint letter to PC21304

replies.msg:
July 9, 2019
To Hong Kong Police Commissioner,


cp@police.gov.hk 
There have been lots of demonstrations and protests in Hong Kong in the recent month. Among many reports, I had learned that one of your fellow officers appeared to challenge the protestors, meeting up with him for a “street fight” on 7th July 2019 in Mongkok. I believe his PC badge number is 21304. I would like to lodge a formal complaint regarding this rude treatment by his and his crew.

In fact, this is not an exceptional case to be directed against one black sheep yet this is a collective attitude and accepted behaviour of the whole police force. There are a lot more  PC who acted like PC21304 who performed their duties in an abusive and unprofessional manner to all the people they directly in contact. However, since most of the PC deliberately hid their badge number before their beast inside came out so it is not possible to name all the PC who turned into beasts one by one. 
Furthermore, it is horrible that it seems that hidden identity and brutal conduct are generally accepted and instructed among the whole crew with permission given by his supervisor. Therefore, not only PC21304 with known badge number should be responsible for the misbehaviour but also his entire team.

I am strongly disappointed and feel deeply threatened by the  brutal conduct of the police towards people

I urge for the prompt response and request for follow-up action, feedback and reference number of this case reported from your department. 
 The requests are:
1. Apology from PC21304 and his crew who damaged the reputation of Hong Kong Police Force and relationship with citizens
2. Dismiss PC21304 who harmed public interests according to Cap. 232 Police Force Ordinance, number 16.
3. Enhance the entry requirement of candidates to a level that they are able to demonstrate reasonable Emotion Intelligence.
4. Review the training provided for the rest of the police force to greatly enhance their Emotion Intelligence and self control which are far below average.

Sincerely,
